subtitle: Software Developer
heroContent: I am 22 years old with a passion for software development, with a knack for crafting robust and scalable web applications. With 2+ years of hands-on experience, I have honed my skills in front-end technologies like React, as well as back-end technologies like Node.js, MySQL, and MongoDB. My goal is to leverage my expertise to create innovative solutions that drive business growth and deliver exceptional user experiences.
med-description: A medical application for booking appointments and managing admin and doctor workflows.
